 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְנֶה‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Exod.3.2|Exod 3:2]]</sup> ==a thorny bush==, perhaps black-berry bush (compare [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>No. 219</sup>; ***rubus fruticosus*** [[BDB#Linn|Linn]].; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סַנְיָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***thorn-bush***, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***sinû***</u></abbr>, [[BDB#Meissn|Meissn]]<sup>ZA vi. 293</sup> ***blackberry bush*** (Meissner thinks Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> loan-word from this); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***senna***, [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1449</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Exod.3.2|Exod 3:2]] (twice in verse); [[Exod.3.4|Exod 3:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנֶ֑ה‎</span> v[[Exod.3.2|Exod 3:2]] v[[Exod.3.3|Exod 3:3]] (all [[BDB#E|E]]) [[Deut.33.16|Deut 33:16]] (akin to [[BDB#E|E]]).
